metrics_conclusion: Metroid - Brinstar Theme has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Metroid - Brinstar Theme has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Minor,  and G Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
